name: Jackie They
introduction: I have been in the marketing and advertising space for more than 15 years working with B2B and B2C brands. My interest in sustainability and climate change had me taking various courses on the topic including a recent one, Professional certification in Sustainability for Senior Leaders with BCG. I would like to leverage my experience and skills to support other members in their comms and marketing to the various stakeholders to drive the sustainability agenda forward.
top_3_advice: The right comms strategy can be powerful to spreading the message
how_can_help: I can offer my marketing skills to help other buddies with their green business
sustainability_journey: My journey into sustainability began with a deep-seated curiosity and a growing sense of urgency. As I delved into the subject, I became acutely aware of the pressing need for individual action, especially in places like Singapore, where environmental awareness is burgeoning but still has a long way to go. I began to understand that the environmental challenges we face are not distant problems; they are immediate threats to our way of life. This newfound awareness also sparked a fire in me to learn more and do something meaningful to contribute to the solution. I began my journey with small, manageable steps. The first thing I did was to educate myself, I learned about the carbon footprint of everyday activities.
sustainable_actions: We are a 100% remote office, and we take the public transport to meetings when possible and only take necessary trips.
challenges_overcome: Time is often the challenge and drives us to adopt less sustainable practices to save time.
most_proud_of: Completing a professional course to gain deeper knowledge on the subject.
experience: 15+ years in marketing and advertising with B2B and B2C brands
education: Professional certification in Sustainability for Senior Leaders with BCG
mission: Leverage marketing experience to support sustainability agenda
